content: ______________________________________________________‚õ§WEBSITE‚õ§ Twitter‚õ§TELEGRAM‚õ§ PITCH DECK FOR RE PARTNERS‚õ§ YOUTUBE ‚õ§ WHITEPAPER‚õ§Audit-PROP-TOKEN‚õ§______________________________________________________Token contact address: 0xEc202b99b5ac4c48f3864cF159369ed1368B62DA ¬†üî∏2,000 USDT worth of $PROP tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.üî∏The bounty program was launched on 25 JULY 2023 and will run until ¬†07 AUGUST 2023.üî∏Tokens will be distributed to participants within 3 week after the end of the Bounty Campaign üî∏. All participants must join Trust M.C 100 Telegram Group, Telegram ChannelAnd Join BlockPark  Telegram Group Twitter Pageüî∏ Please ask your bounty-related questions in the  Trust M.C 100 .üî∏KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.üî∏Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. üî∏Participants with a minimum of 30+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaignsüî∏Negative Trusted Accounts not allow.üî∏All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Twitter ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†40%Telegram ¬† ¬† ¬†25%¬†Reddit ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† 15%TikTok or YouTube ¬† ¬† ¬†20% ¬† ¬†Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† : ¬† First 300 approved participate Telegram ¬† ¬†: ¬†First 200 approved participants.¬†Reddit ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† : First 150 approved participants.¬†TikTok or YouTube: First 80 approved participants.Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread Week: 1 (25/07-31/07)Week: 2 (01/08-07/08)Rewards:  1. 1000 - 3000 followers: 5 stake/week2. 3001 - 5000 followers: 7 stakes/week3. 5001 - 8000 followers: 10 stakes/week4. 8001+ - followers: 14 stakes/weekRules: ¬†‚ñ™Ô∏èMust follow BlockPark  Twitter Page.‚ñ™Ô∏èMust Join BlockPark  Telegram group .‚ñ™Ô∏è Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 1000 followers.‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipants have to make 5 retweet & 2 new posts per week with project link otherwise you get rewarded zero[Maximum 1 post/Day]‚ñ™Ô∏èTime gap between 2 posts needs to be 12 hours minimum.‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipants must use $PROP #BlockPark #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every tweet & retweet.  Twitter Joining formRewards:2 stakes/par post Rules:‚ñ™Ô∏èMust Join BlockPark  Telegram group .‚ñ™Ô∏èUpdate your Telegram name ¬†Your Name | BlockPark Ambassador.(Example: Trust M.C 100 | BlockPark Ambassador)‚ñ™Ô∏èReplace your profile picture with  BlockPark.‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipants can only wear one project name at a time. ‚ñ™Ô∏èYour telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. ‚ñ™Ô∏èWrite at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange‚Äôs telegram groups‚ñ™Ô∏èYou must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.¬†  Telegram Joining formRewards: 1. Have more than 30 Karma: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 Karma: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 Karma: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10000 Karma: 5 stakes/weekRules: ‚ñ™Ô∏è Must Join BlockPark  Telegram .‚ñ™Ô∏èReddit account must be at least 2 month old with at least 10 posts and 30 karmas. ‚ñ™Ô∏èWrite weekly 3 post on own profile & 2 in others crypto subreddit group. (Maximum 1 post/day)‚ñ™Ô∏èPost must focus on a topic relevant to The BlockPark.‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipants must use $PROP #BlockPark #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every own post .  Reddit Joining formRewards:  1. Have more than 1000 views: 1 stake2. Have more than 2000 views: 2 stake3. Have more than 3000 views: 3 stake4. Have more than 5000 views: 5stakes5. Have more than 10,000 views: 10 stakesRules: ‚ñ™Ô∏èMust Join BlockPark  Telegram group .‚ñ™Ô∏èTikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 200 followers or subscribe.‚ñ™Ô∏èVideos need to be unique and have at least 1000 views. ‚ñ™Ô∏èVideos need to be a minimum of 2 minutes in length. ‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features, latest project's token updates/development, etc.‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipants have to shoot 2 unique videos ¬†(minimum 1 video/week).‚ñ™Ô∏èParticipants must use $PROP #BlockPark #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags , wallet address & website link in every video.  TikTok Joining formAll participants have to submit their weekly reports [ Twitter, Telegram Reddit ] on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. Pre-sale link: https://proptoken.com/PROP Token Presale is now LIVE!!! $PROP is backed by property revenue ¬†Receive dividends in $PROP Tokens Enter referral code: MHhlNGMwNGVmMzU5YTFiOTEyMDc5ZDllMjc3MWIxZTgyYWJlNjNjYWJmFor a FREE PROP-NFT and a chance to win 2X PROP Tokens!Buy $PROP Here Each winner will receive $PROP NFT as a prize‚ñ™Ô∏èFor more information visit:Website.Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: [b] Twitter Campaign[/b]Spreadsheet No:Tweet Link1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Retweet Link1. 2. [b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Post Link1. 2. 3. 4. 5. [b]Reddit Campaign[/b]Post on own profile:1. 2. 3. Crypto subreddit group1. 2.
